title: Houdini Documentation
description: Houdini manual.

title: REF FX
description: Great site with lots of real world and CG FX references.

title: od|force Forums
description: Go-to place for community input.

title: Toadstorm Nerdblog
description: Henry Foster's amazing blog. Some of the best guides for the stuff you really need to know about.

title: Juraj Tomori
description: Really cool TD blog. HDA versioning and Rain Instancing write-ups are great. Also has an awesome GitHub.

title: Eetu daily.hip
description: Many great hip files.

title: CG Wiki
description: The OG Houdini instructor. Best Gifs around.

title: Sergen Eren
description: Really great writeups on clouds.

title: Entagma
description: Another amazing all-around Houdini learning site.

title: Houdini Gubbins
description: Super technical, way above my head. Really neat papers and implementations.

title: Houdini Blueprints
description: Run Houdini setups interactively in a browser.

title: Easings
description: Cheat sheet for keyframe tangents.

title: HDRI Haven
description: A place with many high-quality HDRIs for lighting.

title: Rich Lord
description: Lots of fun setups. Some cool locomotion stuff with RBDs and Vellum.

title: Junchiro Horikawa
description: Cool channel, very vex-focused. His Algorithmic design lessons are top-notch.

title: Peter Claes
description: Great instructor, amazing learning content.

title: XAPKOHHEH
description: Mindblowing setups. Check out what really goes on when you animate a cube.

title: Ryoji CG Memo
description: So many useful snippets. Found myself visiting this frequently starting out.

title: Shadertoy
description: Many implementations of ridiculously cool shaders. Not sure where all these people are, but there are tons of cool shaders to look at here.

title: Nature of Code
description: Free e-book written to explore coding with Processing. Very interesting.

title: Red Blob Games
description: Great breakdowns of algorithms and whitepapers.

title: The Book of Shaders
description: Another free e-book about writing shaders. Have only just started it.

title: Chris Brejon - CG Cinamatography Archives
description: Another book-style site that covers more of the artistic side of CG lighting.

title: Zeno Pelgrims
description: Original creator of shaders.xyz! Now writing cool imagers for Arnold, including Lentil.

title: Fundza
description: Interesting CG math coding tutorials and examples.

title: Andreas BÃ¶inghoff
description: Another cool blog about VOPs.

title: Tuxedo Labs - Blue Noise
description: Writeup about noise.

title: Lee Griggs - Arnold Rendering Blog
description: Cool blog from one of the Arnold devs.

title: Steven Blair - Arnold Support Blog
description: Another blog from Arnold dev Steven Blair. Really useful writeups, especially the one about visibility bitmasking.

title: Nukepedia
description: Go-to place for Nuke plugins and gizmos. Make sure you get an account so can you download stuff.

title: Comp Fu
description: Various Nuke blog posts and tutorials.

title: Doctor Hou Doodles
description: Another blog with some interesting setups.

title: CG Render DNA
description: Very similar layout to Doctor Hou Doodles above, but more rendering-oriented.

title: I, Houdini
description: Really cool write up about cloth tearing in Houdini.

title: Quiita (Japanese)
description: Japanese blog with some useful info about Alembic.

title: Dear Houdini (Japanese)
description: Another Japanese blog with a lot of vex snippets.

title: Heribert Raab
description: Some cool rendering art.

title: Heribert Raab (Blog)
description: Blog related to the above link.

title: Sadjad Rabiee
description: Awesome youtube channel with tons of great Pyro techniques.
